text: Morné Louis Blom (born 25 April 1989) is a Namibian rugby union player, currently playing with the Namibia national team. His regular position is flanker or lock. ==Rugby career== Blom was born in Edenville in South Africa, but grew up in Windhoek. He made his test debut for in 2010 against . He represented the in the South African domestic Vodacom Cup competition in 2010 and 2011, before the team withdrew due to financial reasons. He again played for the team since their return to South African competitions in 2015. ==External links== * ==References== Category:Namibian rugby union players Category:Living people Category:1989 births Category:People from Ngwathe Local Municipality Category:Rugby union locks Category:Rugby union flankers Category:Namibia international rugby union players
title: Morné Blom
